bioAsHtml: A difficult double life : by day, I'm responsible for communications for a Research and Development Center, at night, some call me K33gorg and I become a "Golo developer advocate". I am also co-organizer of the French conference Mix-it

acceptedTalks.title: OMG! Terminator will be coded in JavaScript!

bio:
A difficult double life : by day, I'm responsible for communications for a Research and Development Center, at night, some call me K33gorg and I become a "Golo developer advocate".
I am also co-organizer of the French conference Mix-it
